pageContext.claim: “Over the past two years, we have increased federal funding for HBCUs by a record 13 percent. Check out the last administration. See what they did for you. Not too much.”
pageContext.analysis: This isn't accurate. Not all of the 13 percent increase in funding is money given directly to institutions. Rather, it includes funds for capital finance and loan deferments, according to Dillard University President Dr. Walter M. Kimbrough.
